titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 10 through April 14, 2017 as "National Assistant Principals Week".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 10 through April 14, 2017 as "National Assistant Principals Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of April 10-April 14, 2017, as National Assistant Principals Week.
Honors the contributions of assistant principals to students' success.
